entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
